name: Garfield's Mission: The Pizza Heist
description:
Mod made by ChaffyAxePlayz

Original game by mystman12

Original Characters by Jim Davis

Music from The Garfield Show

This mod is not complete and won't be updated.

This mod is part joke mod part regular mod.

Story:

You play as Chaffy, today is Monday and Garfield gets kicked out of the house for abusing Nermal. Garfield sends you a letter and it tells you to get him lunch.
